Code With Dan
About Languages Blog

A little about what we do

Code with Dan is a project that I wish I had when I was learning how to get started. After all, getting started is the hardest part. There's so much to take on. There seems to be a never ending amount of languages,libraries & frameworks its easy to feel over whelmed. That's why I created this site, to help guide curious coders to what really matters, without all the jargon, all for free. I aim to equip you with the basic knowledge and resources to get you started. Your Journey has to begin somewhere, so why not right here.
